name: DNA: Episode 2
description:
Continue in the World of the DNA Universe...




DNA Episode 2 is a continuation of DNA Episode 1 in the form of a 2D Story-driven Anime, Hack & Slash Beat'em-up where you play as the main character Leo, as he has been summoned by Chairman Sujo entering the region of Kesho City. All in the effort to recover the alien specimen that Kesho has been using its technology to advance its city.

Continue your Journey to find The Purpose of One's DNA...


  • Progress through Kesho City as you unlock unique new abilities in your skill tree.

  • Follow up with Leo's story in a new action-packed, hand-drawn world with gripping 2D hack & slash gameplay.

  • Uncover Leo's mission to retrieve the alien specimen in Kesho City as you progress through each scenario.


Pick up on Familiar Gameplay...


  • Experience welcoming 2D Beat'em up gameplay with new abilities to acquire!

  • Continue playing a challenging gameplay formula building upon DNA Episode 1's rewarding difficulties.

  • Uncover many new foes and ways to defeat them in the treacherous scenarios of Kesho City!


See more of DNA through Leo's Eyes...


  • Watch as the story develops further into intriguing events in Episode 2 of DNA.

  • Move through the city as the Kesho military sends reinforcements to protect Kesho City from Leo and Novacorp.

  • Fight your way through Kesho City as the Kesho military sends Kesho Wartanks, Mechas, and Cyborgs to defend the City at all costs.
